data.title: Valis Engineering - Airport Industry Review
data.meta_description: Our engineers focused on the issues that airport planers and operators face today to develop a complete range of:noise barriers,airside safety fences,blast deflectors andground Run-Up enclosures (GRE)Those solutions are designed according to European, FAA and ICAO standards for airport equipment and in line with the safety and usability concerns. VALIS HEL model Jet Blast DeflectorA jet blast deflector (JBD) is a safety device that redirects the high energy exhaust from a jet engines to prevent damage and i
